rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: Spacious and accessible entry with wide door openings (minimum 42 inches) for wheelchair access. A reception desk area integrated with modern LED lighting.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open plan living space connected to a semi-open dining area; designed to encourage free movement and social interaction. Vastu compliant alignment with east facing windows for light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Separate dining zone adjacent to the living room; includes a breakfast counter and ample natural lighting.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped private gym with adjustable equipment, mirrored walls, and integrated soundproofing. Ensures accessibility with ramps and handrails where needed.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible guest bathroom designed for wheelchair users including grab bars and easy-to-use fixtures.

openings.description: Accessible entry door with a ramp leading directly into the entrance hallway.
Large windows to provide abundant natural light and ventilation, ensuring compliance with Vastu principles by aligning east and south exposures.

openings.location: Between living room and dining area
openings.description: Accessible door to allow smooth transitions between spaces.
Balcony access with safety rails and sufficient clearance for wheelchair maneuverability.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with an en-suite bathroom. Features include a walk-in closet and ample storage space; designed to maintain privacy and ensure smooth accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for family members with integrated study area; optimized layout for easy wheelchair navigation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Compact yet functional bedroom designed with accessibility features and natural light from strategically placed windows.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Spare bedroom with adaptable furniture for wheelchair users. Ensures compliance with local building norms regarding space allotment.

rooms.name: Family Bathroom
rooms.description: Common bathroom with accessible fixtures including grab bars and sufficient maneuvering space.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible staircase with an adjacent lift option to meet accessibility standards.

openings.location: Master Bedroom, Bedroom 2, Bedroom 3, and Bedroom 4
openings.description: Windows positioned for optimal natural light and to adhere to Vastu principles with a focus on north-eastern exposure.
Interior doorways designed to allow smooth transitions and emergency egress.

openings.location: Adjacent to living room area on roof terrace
openings.description: Access to the roof terrace providing an outdoor relaxation space with safety railings and weatherproof design.
Skylights and windows ensuring adequate ventilation and natural light while maintaining privacy.

vastu_considerations.north_direction: Main entrance aligned with the north for positive energy.
vastu_considerations.east_exposure: Living room and gym windows to ensure morning sunlight enhances vitality.
vastu_considerations.central_court: Open living areas designed around a central courtyard concept to maintain natural balance.
vastu_considerations.water_systems: Rainwater harvesting integrated in roof terrace design.

wheelchair_accessibility_features.ramps: Installed at main entrance and staircase area with gentle slopes as per accessibility guidelines.
wheelchair_accessibility_features.door_widths: Minimum door widths of 36 inches for interior and exterior access ensuring ease of movement.
wheelchair_accessibility_features.accessible_faucets: All bathroom fixtures designed to be reachable from a wheelchair position.

architectural_style: Contemporary split-level design integrating modern luxury with traditional Vastu principles.
